text.value: Influence is the best way to rule the country and people. Become the most influential person in the USA by proving that money is just a consequence of acquired influence!
You need to get to the top of the rating of the richest people in the USA as soon as possible. Maybe you will be able to get ahead of John D. Rockefeller by becoming a billionaire sooner than he
It is the quintessence of wealth and influence. Only the best of the best can become the most powerful persons among other
Hardcore economy with dynamic financial indicators. Quarterly ups and downs of the market as well as constantly changing prices. That's a pretty tough competition world!
You only start learning the finance basics. Your competitors are friendly and compliant.
In order to achieve power and greatness, you need to make superhuman efforts! Are you ready to feel the consequences of decisions affecting human destiny?
You know how to make a business! In order to win your opponents, you should be able to find the most cunning ways to achieve the goal. Be ready to rack your brain!
You have a 100% the company's stake and a small staff component of 10 people. Cash in hand $1,000,000

America after the Civil War and the Abolition of Slavery, the rise of monopolies and the formation of the largest private equity!. There are oil, banking, logistics and other industries. You have unlimited opportunities!
